20200606 CHURCHILL DOWNS 2 2 $2,200 N Y http://www.test.equineline.com/to/be/determined/00003.htm update on line 41: + **BEAUTIFUL GIFT** (2018 f. by Medaglia d'Oro). Winner at 2 and 3, $180,100, 1st Santa Ysabel S. **[G3]** (SA, $60,000), 2nd Santa Anita Oaks **[G2]** (SA, $80,000). Sent from United States to Japan in 2022. Dam is in line 38: SEA GIFT, by A.P. Indy. Winner in 1 start at 3, 3,738 Pounds, in England. Sent from United States to United Arab Emirates in 2003. Returned to United States from Great Britain in 2005. (Total: $6,814). Half-sister to **Bicoastal** (Total: $91,130, 2nd Normandie Stud Prestige S. **[G3]**), **Cherry Baby** (Total: $28,891, 2nd Clasico Santorin **[G3]**, etc.). Dam of 14 foals, 10 to race, 7 winners--
